To Have Machines Make Math Proofs, Turn Them Into a Puzzle - Quanta Magazine
tech_news.description: Marijn Heule turns mathematical statements into something like Sudoku puzzles, then has computers go to work on them. His proofs have been called “disgusting,” but they go beyond what any human can do.
